reviewText: This dvd did a great job of describing the beauty and history of  Ireland.  This country truly is a magical land.  I would recommend this set for anyone interested in learning more about this magnificent island!

Full disclosure  I love everything about Ireland, so I am bias. I like the programs, they are bite short, but over all well done. They give you a belief undering of Irish culture during mid-evil times. If you want some good Irish history look to this series to Bbc Story of Ireland. I wish they made more stuff on Ireland.
